title: 联机崩溃！急需大佬支援！
author: LSLY
txt_content:

replies.author: Stant_hed
replies.txt_content:
config文件夹中forge配置，搜索remove，
两个false改为true即可。

还有你发错板块了

replies.author: LSLY
replies.txt_content:
Stant_hed 发表于 2019-8-24 10:40
config文件夹中forge配置，搜索remove，
两个false改为true即可。
谢谢大佬
